topic.title: After Hadoop Cluster Deployment
topic.shortdesc: After The Hadoop cluster has been deployed by Cloudera Manager:

ol.li: Run the Host Inspector from the Cloudera Manager user interface.
Monitor Cloudera Manager health checks on a regular basis.
